TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit CookieHandler extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供用于读取、编写和删除会话 Cookie 的抽象基类在 HTTP 客服端上。

span.span: Provides an abstract base class for reading, writing, and deleting session cookies on an HTTP client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks (SAM) 使用类的实例来读取、写入和删除 HTTP 客户端上包含的 cookie 或 cookie。 The (SAM) uses an instance of the class to read, write, and delete the cookie or cookies that contain the on the HTTP client. 包含会话令牌的 cookie (如果会话令牌分为多个 cookie, 则为 cookie) 称为会话 cookie。The cookie (or cookies, in the case where the session token is split across several cookies) that contains the session token is known as the session cookie. Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) 附带了一个 cookie 处理程序, 该处理程序称为由类实现的分块 cookie 处理程序。Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) ships with a cookie handler called the chunked cookie handler that is implemented by the class. 分块 cookie 处理程序根据指定的区块大小, 在一个或多个 cookie 中拆分会话令牌。The chunked cookie handler splits the session token across one or more cookies according to a specified chunk size. 这是为了满足许多浏览器施加的各个 cookie 的大小限制。This is to meet size limitations on individual cookies imposed by many browsers. 可以从派生, 以创建自己的 cookie 处理程序。You can derive from to create your own cookie handler. 当你执行此操作时, 必须重写、和方法, 以执行删除、读取和写入会话 cookie 的实际工作。When you do so, you must override the , , and methods to perform the actual work of deleting, reading, and writing the session cookie. 通常, 这些方法从集合中读取 cookie, 并通过集合写入或删除 cookie。These methods typically read the cookie from the collection and write or delete cookies through the collection. 可以通过其访问请求和响应的对象作为参数提供给上述每个方法。The object through which you can access the request and response is provided as a parameter to each of these methods. 除了所需的方法之外, 您还可以选择重写类公开的其他虚方法属性, 以自定义处理程序的行为。In addition to the required methods, you can optionally override other virtual methods properties exposed by the class to customize the behavior of your handler. 类公开了多个属性, 这些属性指定会话 cookie 的默认行为和属性。Several properties are exposed by the class that specify default behavior and properties for the session cookie. 、和属性提供了 cookie 的基名称、它在其中有效的域以及它在客户端上的存储路径。 The , , and properties supply the base name for the cookie, the domain in which it is valid and the path under which it is stored on the client. 属性指定是否可通过客户端脚本访问 cookie。The property specifies whether the cookie is accessible to client-side scripts. 属性指定是否只应通过安全 (HTTPS) 连接传输 cookie。The property specifies whether the cookie should be transmitted only over secure (HTTPS) connections. 如果设置此属性 , 则该属性用于为持久会话设置过期时间, 即即使在浏览器关闭后仍有效的会话也是如此。If set, the property is used to set the expiration time for persistent sessions, that is for sessions that remain valid even after the browser is closed. 所有这些属性都具有等效的属性, 这些属性通常由处理程序的 "核心" 方法在基础对象 (或对象) 上设置。All of these properties have equivalent properties that are typically set on the underlying object (or objects) by the "core" methods of the handler. 有关详细信息, 请参阅每个属性的文档。For more information see the documentation for each property. 可以通过[ <cookieHandler> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/cookiehandler.md)元素在配置中指定 SAM 使用的 cookie 处理程序。The cookie handler that is used by the SAM can be specified in configuration through the [<cookieHandler>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/cookiehandler.md) element. 可以在事件的事件委托中修改此元素设置的 cookie 处理程序, 也可以通过属性直接对其进行设置或访问。The cookie handler set by this element can be modified in an event delegate for the event or it can be set or accessed directly through the property. ## Examples 下面的示例将 SAM 配置为使用类型`MyNamespace.MyCustomCookieHandler`的自定义 cookie 处理程序。The following example configures the SAM to use a custom cookie handler of type `MyNamespace.MyCustomCookieHandler`. ```xml ```

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，删除与指定请求（具有指定名称、域和路径）关联的 cookie。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, deletes the cookie associated with the specified request that has the specified name, domain, and path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从重载方法调用, 用于执行删除 cookie 的实际工作。Called from the overloaded methods to do the actual work of deleting the cookie. 方法将确保名称和路径为非空字符串。The methods will ensure that name and path are non-empty strings.

para.span: 实现完全取决于开发人员。

span.span: The implementation is entirely up to the developer.

para.span: 在典型情况下, 实现会将集合中的指定 cookie 替换为包含数据的 cookie, 并将过期时间设置为早于当前时间; 但是, 这并不是必需的。

span.span: In the typical case, implementations replace the specified cookie in the collection, with a cookie that has data and an expiration time that is set earlier than the current time; however, this is not a requirement.

summary.span: 获取或设置用于 Cookie 的域。

span.span: Gets or sets the domain used for cookies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与 属性相对应。Corresponds to the property. 可以通过在配置中的[ <cookieHandler> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/cookiehandler.md)元素`domain`上指定特性来初始化属性。The property can be initialized by specifying the `domain` attribute on the [<cookieHandler>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/cookiehandler.md) element in configuration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制是否在由处理程序编写的 cookie 的 Set Cookie 标头中发出 "HttpOnly" 标志。Controls whether the "HttpOnly" flag is emitted in the Set-Cookie header for cookies written by the handler. 某些 web 浏览器通过保持客户端脚本访问 cookie 值来服从此标志。Some web browsers honor this flag by keeping client-side script from accessing the cookie value. 此属性与属性相对应。This property corresponds to the property. 可以通过在配置中的[ <cookieHandler> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/cookiehandler.md)元素`hideFromScript`上指定特性来初始化属性。The property can be initialized by specifying the `hideFromScript` attribute on the [<cookieHandler>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/cookiehandler.md) element in configuration.

summary.span: 永久会话的生存期。
如果为零，将始终使用瞬变会话。

span.span: If zero, transient sessions are always used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 持久会话的票证存储在基于文件的 cookie 中, 这意味着在关闭并重新打开 web 浏览器后, 登录会话可能会继续。Tickets for persistent sessions are stored in file-based cookies, meaning that the sign-in session may continue after the web browser is closed and reopened. 此属性用于设置属性。This property is used to set the property. 可以通过在配置中的[ <cookieHandler> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/cookiehandler.md)元素`persistentSessionLifetime`上指定特性来初始化属性。The property can be initialized by specifying the `persistentSessionLifetime` attribute on the [<cookieHandler>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/cookiehandler.md) element in configuration.

span.span: A value that is less than zero is specified.

summary.span: 读取 Cookie。

value.span: 如果只应针对 SSL 连接使用 cookie，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the cookie should only be used over an SSL connection; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制是否为写入的任何 cookie 发出集 Cookie 标头中的 "安全" 标志。Controls whether the "Secure" flag in the Set-Cookie header is emitted for any cookies written. 如果此值为`true`, 则会话 cookie 仅可通过 HTTPS 使用。If this value is `true`, the session cookies will only be available over HTTPS. 此属性与属性相对应。This property corresponds to the property. 可以通过在配置中的[ <cookieHandler> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/cookiehandler.md)元素`requireSSL`上指定特性来初始化属性。The property can be initialized by specifying the `requireSSL` attribute on the [<cookieHandler>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/cookiehandler.md) element in configuration.

summary.span: 写入 cookie。

span.span: if the cookie is persistent; if the cookie is session-only, that is, only valid until the browser on the client is closed.
The expiration time for the underlying token.

summary.span: 写入当前请求（具有指定值、持久性和过期时间）关联的 cookie，。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果参数为`false`, 则 cookie 过期时间将设置为。 `isPersistent`If the `isPersistent` parameter is `false`, the cookie expiration time is set to . `null` `null`如果参数为`true`, 则 cookie 过期时间将设置为属性的值 (如果该属性不为或, 如果属性为, 则将过期时间设置为`isPersistent` `tokenExpirationTime`参数。If the `isPersistent` parameter is `true`, the cookie expiration time is set to the value of the property if it is not `null` or, if the property is `null`, the expiration time is set to the value of the `tokenExpirationTime` parameter. Cookie 名称、域和路径由、 和属性指定。The cookie name, domain and path are specified by the , , and properties. 请求由指定。The request is specified by . 是否应仅通过 SSL 发送 cookie 是由属性指定的, 以及是否应在客户端脚本中隐藏该 cookie 是由属性指定的。Whether the cookie should be sent only over SSL is specified by the property and whether the cookie should be hidden from client-side scripts is specified by the property.

summary.span: 写入指定请求（具有指定名称、值和过期时间）关联的 cookie，。

span.span: Writes a cookie associated with the specified request that has the specified name, value, and expiration time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Cookie 域和路径由和属性指定。The cookie domain and path are specified by the and properties. 请求由指定。The request is specified by . 是否应仅通过 SSL 发送 cookie 是由属性指定的, 以及是否应在客户端脚本中隐藏该 cookie 是由属性指定的。Whether the cookie should be sent only over SSL is specified by the property and whether the cookie should be hidden from client-side scripts is specified by the property.

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，写入与指定请求（具有指定名称、值、域、路径、过期时间、持久性和可见性）关联的 cookie。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, writes a cookie associated with the specified request that has the specified name, value, domain, path, expiration time, persistence and visibility.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从重载方法调用, 用于执行写入 cookie 的实际工作。Called from the overloaded methods to do the actual work of writing the cookie. 方法将`name`确保为非空字节数组, 并且和`path`为非空字符串。 `value` The methods will ensure that `value` is a non-empty byte array and that `name` and `path` are non-empty strings.

para.span: 实现完全取决于开发人员。

span.span: The implementation is entirely up to the developer.

para.span: 在典型情况下, 实现将 cookie 数据写入集合, 但这不是必需的。

span.span: In the typical case, implementations write the cookie data to the collection, however, this is not a requirement.

para.span: 此方法的大多数参数通常用于在一个或多个对象上设置等效的属性。

span.span: Most parameters of the method are typically used to set equivalent properties on one or more objects.
